books.author: by Harlan Coben
books.description: When a girl goes missing, a private investigator’s feral childhood becomes an asset in the search.
books.name: THE BOY FROM THE WOODS

books.author: by Celeste Ng
books.description: An artist upends a quiet town outside Cleveland.
books.name: LITTLE FIRES EVERYWHERE

books.author: by Patricia Briggs
books.description: The 12th book in the Mercy Thompson series. The car mechanic who has the ability to turn into a coyote takes on a deadly foe.
books.name: SMOKE BITTEN

books.author: by Delia Owens
books.description: In a quiet town on the North Carolina coast in 1969, a young woman who survived alone in the marsh becomes a murder suspect.
books.name: WHERE THE CRAWDADS SING

books.author: by Stuart Woods
books.description: The 53rd book in the Stone Barrington series. The former N.Y.P.D. detective takes it upon himself to get the target off his back.
books.name: HIT LIST

books.author: by Jeanine Cummins
books.description: A bookseller flees Mexico for the United States with her son while pursued by the head of a drug cartel.
books.name: AMERICAN DIRT

books.author: by Rebecca Serle
books.description: A Manhattan lawyer finds herself confronting a vision she had when elements of it come to life on schedule.
books.name: IN FIVE YEARS

books.author: by Hilary Mantel
books.description: The third book in the Wolf Hall trilogy. After Anne Boleyn’s execution, Thomas Cromwell’s enemies assemble.
books.name: THE MIRROR & THE LIGHT

books.author: by Rae Carson
books.description: The Resistance goes on a new adventure as word of the re-emergence of Emperor Palpatine is sent across the galaxy.
books.name: STAR WARS: THE RISE OF SKYWALKER

books.author: by Kathy Reichs
books.description: The 19th book in the Temperance Brennan series. The forensic anthropologist seeks the identity of a corpse missing its face and hands.
books.name: A CONSPIRACY OF BONES

books.author: by James Patterson and James O. Born
books.description: The 12th book in the Michael Bennett series. A serial-killing spree might impact national security.
books.name: BLINDSIDE

books.author: by C.J. Box
books.description: The 20th book in the Joe Pickett series. A grizzly bear attack and an attempted assassination of a local judge baffle the Wyoming game warden.
books.name: LONG RANGE

books.author: by Alex Michaelides
books.description: Theo Faber looks into the mystery of a famous painter who stops speaking after shooting her husband.
books.name: THE SILENT PATIENT

books.author: by Clive Cussler and Graham Brown
books.description: The 17th book of the NUMA Files series. The NUMA squad teams with British MI5 to stop arms dealers from stealing ancient relics.
books.name: JOURNEY OF THE PHARAOHS

books.author: by Heather Morris
books.description: A concentration camp detainee tasked with permanently marking fellow prisoners falls in love with one of them.
books.name: THE TATTOOIST OF AUSCHWITZ
